article.title: Advanced Systems Receives Contract Modification
article.author: George I. Seffers
article.text: Advanced Systems Development Inc., Alexandria, Va., was awarded a $6,671,773 modification (P00037) to a previously awarded firm-fixed-price, option-filled contract (W9124Q-11-F-0020) for information systems operations support services. The cumulative total face value of this contract is $19,681,425. The Army Contracting Command, White Sands Missile Range, N.M., is the contracting activity.
